general.name: starrv-boss
general.description: Each starrv file contains the stellar radial velocities and associated data for a single plate configuration.
general.generated_by: migration: not in database. Needs update

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

FCJD.name: FCJD
FCJD.description:
Flux Centered Julian Date
    Array. Every array for a single plate is identical and contains all
    of the FCJDs for that plate.
FCJD.unit: migration: unit of keyword/column not found. Needs update

STARRV.name: STARRV
STARRV.description:
Radial Velocity
    computed from the University of Florida 1D pipeline.

BCV.name: BCV
BCV.description:
Barycentric Velocity of
    corresponding RV measurement time.

OFFSETERROR.name: OFFSETERROR
OFFSETERROR.description:
Expected RV error for
    each order. It is based on the statistics of the entire MARVELS program and is a
    function of the star's magnitude and the typical quality of the order it
    is in. An RV with variations outside of this value are considered as
    actually showing the presence of a signal.
